remarks.format: ## Remarks 此类公开的所有属性、 方法和图表 Web 控件的事件。This class exposes all of the properties, methods and events of the Chart Web control. 两个重要属性类和属性，这两种是集合属性。Two important properties of the class are the and properties, both of which are collection properties. 集合属性存储对象，用于存储是与该数据的属性一起显示的数据。The collection property stores objects, which are used to store data that is to be displayed, along with attributes of that data. 集合属性存储主要用于绘制一个或多个图表使用一组轴的对象。The collection property stores objects, which are primarily used to draw one or more charts using one set of axes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法用于对齐沿 X 轴使用的轴标签，不同系列中的数据点，并且是适用：This method is used to align data points from different series along the X axis using their axis labels, and is applicable when: - 多个序列的显示，并且编制索引;这就是，所有数据点都具有0，或属性是`true`。Multiple series are displayed and are indexed; that is, all data points have an of 0, or the property is `true`. - 所有数据点都具有非空轴标签，它们是唯一的其。All data points have non-empty axis labels, which are unique to their . 如果它们不是唯一的则将引发异常。If they are not unique, an exception will be thrown. 在创建多个系列会导致数据绑定时，这种情况下是很常见和`string`值用于 x 轴值。This situation is very common when data-binding results in the creation of multiple series, and `string` values are used for X-axis values. 当多个索引时，会出现两个问题系列的绘制，并且使用设置 X 值`string`值：Two issues arise when multiple, indexed series are plotted, and the X-values are set using `string` values: - 不能保证，将在同一索引沿 X 轴绘制不同系列中具有相同的字符串 X 值的数据点。It cannot be guaranteed that data points from different series with the same string X-values will be plotted at the same index along the X axis. - 将显示仅第一个序列中的数据点的轴标签，即使其他系列中具有相同的索引的数据点太具有轴标签。Only the axis label for the data points in the first series will be displayed, even though data points from other series with the same index have axis labels too. 默认情况下，在其序列中的存储的顺序绘制的点。By default, points are plotted in the order in which they are stored in their series. 若要指定排序顺序，请使用`AlignDataPointsByAxisLabel`具有方法重载`sortingOrder`参数。To specify a sort order, use an `AlignDataPointsByAxisLabel` method overload that has a `sortingOrder` parameter.

value.span: 一个 枚举值。

span.span: An enumeration value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 抗锯齿来"粗糙边缘"平滑通过填充像素而中间颜色和对于整理的图表的未绘制为矩形的边缘特别有效。Anti-aliasing smoothens out "jagged edges" by padding pixels with intermediate colors, and is especially effective for smoothing out edges for charts that are not drawn as rectangles. 例如，抗锯齿折线图和饼图中，对于非常有效，但不是为适合条形图和柱形图。For example, anti-aliasing is very effective for line charts and pie charts, but is not as effective for bar and column charts. 抗锯齿可以应用于如矩形、 圆形和等的文本和/或图形基元。Anti-aliasing can be applied to text and/or graphics primitives such as rectangles, circles, and so forth. 请注意该抗锯齿将影响性能。Note that anti-aliasing will affect performance.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 你可以将此属性设置为任何有效的 ARGB alpha、 红色、 绿色 (蓝色） 值。You can set this property to any valid ARGB (alpha, red, green, blue) value. 请注意，对于对象，无法将 alpha 分量设置为 255 以外的值。Note that for the object, the alpha component cannot be set to a value other than 255. 这还意味着，对于仅，对象值不能使用。This also means that, for the object only, a value cannot be used. 值将是如果你正在使用的背景的渐变颜色使用的第一个颜色。The value will be the first color used if you are using gradient colors for the background. Alpha 值控制一种颜色的不的透明度。The alpha value controls the opacity of a color. 如果将此颜色设置为"透明"— 也就是说，如果你使用的 alpha 值为 0-无颜色将分配给标题的背景。If you set this color to "transparent"—that is, if you use an alpha value of 0—no color will be assigned to the background of the title. 因此，背景将呈透明。As a result, the background will be transparent. 下表表示支持渐变的类型：The following table represents the types that support gradients: |系列类型Series Types|二维2D|3D3D| |------------------|--------|--------| |条形图Bar|XX|-| |盒须图Box Plot|XX|XX| |气泡图Bubble|-|-| |烛状图条Candle Stick|XX|XX| |列Column|XX|XX| |圆环图Doughnut|XX|-| |误差条形图Error Bar|-|-| |快速扫描线Fast Line|-|-| |快速点Fast Point|-|-| |漏斗图Funnel|XX|XX| |甘特图Gantt|XX|-| |卡吉图Kagi|-|-| |线Line|-|-| |饼图Pie|XX|-| |点Point|-|-| |点数图Point and Figure|XX|-| |极坐标图Polar|-|-| |棱锥图Pyramid|XX|XX| |雷达图Radar|XX|XX| |范围列Range Column|XX|-| |砖形图Renko|XX|-| |样条Spline|-|-| |样条面积图区域Spline Area Area|XX|-| |样条范围图Spline Range|XX|-| |堆积面积图Stacked Area|XX|-| |百分比堆积的面积图Stacked Area 100|XX|-| |堆积条形图Stacked Bar|XX|-| |百分比堆积条形 100 图Stacked Bar 100|XX|-| |堆积柱形图Stacked Column|XX|-| |百分比堆积的柱形图Stacked Column 100|XX|-| |阶梯线Step Line|-|-| |股价图Stock|-|-| |新三值图Three Line Break|XX|-|

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性定义的背景图像路径图例中，可以是绝对或相对 URL。This property defines a path to a background image for a legend, and can be an absolute or relative URL. 若要定位图像，请使用和属性。To position the image, use the and properties. 你还可以指定通过设置为"透明"的映像显示的颜色之一属性。You can also specify one of the colors displayed by the image as "transparent", by setting the property. 映像可以来源于支持.NET Framework，包括图标的任何有效图形文件。An image can originate from any valid graphics file supported by .NET Framework, including icons. 背景图像优先于其他后台属性，如渐变颜色。Background images take precedence over other background properties such as gradient color.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性确定图像的显示方式，例如，平铺、 缩放后，等等。This property determines how the image is displayed, for example, tiled, scaled, and so forth. 如果缩放图像，它将拉伸以适合该图表的边界。If an image is scaled, it will be stretched to fit within the bounds of the chart. 如果平铺图像，则从图表左上角开始，对其重复绘制。If the image is tiled, it is repeatedly drawn, starting from the top-left corner of the chart. 有关可用包装模式的详细信息，请参阅枚举主题。For more information about the available wrapping modes, see the enumeration topic. 如果属性设置为，绘制图像的位置由属性设置。If the property is set to , the location where the image is drawn is determined by the property setting.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event Customize As EventHandler

summary.span: Occurs just before the chart image is drawn.

span.span: Occurs just before the chart image is drawn.

summary.span: All chart data is available and all chart properties have been set.

span.span: All chart data is available and all chart properties have been set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此事件具有两个唯一的功能：This event has two unique features: - 所有图表数据;也就是说，填充序列和它们的数据点。All chart data is available; that is, the series and their data points are populated. 这是特别有用，如果正在使用数据绑定，因为可以检查数据，并可以在绘制之前调整图表。This is especially useful if data-binding is being used, because the data can be examined and the chart can be adjusted just prior to being drawn. - 所有图表属性尚未都设置，包括那些已都设置为"Auto"的属性。All chart properties have been set, including those properties that have been set to "Auto". 换而言之，"Auto"属性现在存储自动计算的值，并可以检查和修改之前在绘制图表。In other words, "Auto" properties now store the automatically calculated values, and can be examined and modified prior to the chart being drawn. 示例包括和属性类。Examples are the and properties of the class. 使用此事件来修改或自定义图表图像之前进行绘制。Use this event to modify or customize the chart image before it is drawn. 当在图表区作出更改时，如到轴刻度，图表区属性必须重新计算为了正确呈现图表。When changes are made to a chart area, such as to the axis scale, the chart area properties must be recalculated in order to render the chart correctly. 若要重新计算该图表，调用方法之后进行修改。To recalculate the chart, call the method after making modifications.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event CustomizeLegend As EventHandler(Of CustomizeLegendEventArgs)

summary.span: Occurs just before the chart legend is drawn.

span.span: Occurs just before the chart legend is drawn.

summary.span: Use this event to customize the chart legend items.

span.span: Use this event to customize the chart legend items.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 事件主要用于自定义图例，它绘制之前。The event is primarily used to customize the legend just before it is drawn. 默认构造函数和自定义图例项可以删除或修改，并且也可以添加自定义项。Both default and custom legend items can be removed or modified, and custom items can also be added. 此外，可以更改图例项的顺序。In addition, the order of legend items can be changed. 此外可以通过使用发件人自变量进行绘制之前修改图表图像。The chart image can also be modified before being drawn by using the sender argument. 请注意，默认图例项是为数据序列中的或数据点，创建一个项目而自定义图例项以任何方式与图表数据未连接。Note that a default legend item is an item that is created for either a data series or data point, but a custom legend item is not connected in any way to the chart data.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event CustomizeMapAreas As EventHandler(Of CustomizeMapAreasEventArgs)

summary.span: Occurs just before the chart image map is rendered.

span.span: Occurs just before the chart image map is rendered.

summary.span: Use this event to customize the map areas items.

span.span: Use this event to customize the map areas items.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性类可用于：The property of the class can be used to: - 删除或修改自动已为 chart 对象; 创建的映射项任何数据点，系列，图例项或带状线的对象具有非空`Url`，`MapAreaAttributes`或`ToolTip`属性将具有关联的地图区域对象。Delete or modify map items that have automatically been created for a chart object; any data point, series, legend item or strip line object that has a non-empty `Url`, `MapAreaAttributes` or `ToolTip` property will have an associated map area object. - 添加具有用户定义的形状和坐标的自定义映射区。Add custom map areas that have a user-defined shape and coordinates. > [!NOTE] > 类型的发件人自变量是只读的。The sender argument of type is read-only.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果你想要从流，如内存流、 文件流和等加载模板，请使用此方法。Use this method if you want to load a template from a stream, such as a memory stream, file stream, and so forth. 请确保设置属性`true`保存模板的模板之前方法。Make sure to set the property to `true` before saving the template with the method. 如果加载的模板有两个数据序列，该系列的外观属性将按顺序应用到图表。If a loaded template has two data series, the appearance properties of the series are applied sequentially to the chart. 换而言之，第一个模板序列外观属性赋予图表的第一个系列，第二个模板序列外观属性适用于在该图中，第二个序列，然后对于第三个再次使用第一个模板序列系列的图中，依次类推。In other words, the first template series appearance properties are assigned to the first series of the chart, the second template series appearance properties are applied to the second series of the chart, then the first template series is used again for the third series of the chart, and so on. 对于如此图表区和外观属性的任何其他集合。The same holds true for chart areas, and any other collections that have appearance properties. 模板可以用于模拟自定义调色板。Templates can be used to simulate custom palettes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调色板用于自动将颜色分配给数据元素，如果两个以下条件均已满足：A palette is used to automatically assign colors to data elements if both of the following conditions have been met: - 数据点本身不具有分配给他们的颜色。the data points themselves do not have colors assigned to them. - 数据序列数据点属于还没有分配的颜色。the data series that the data points belong to also does not have an assigned color. 如果未显式不指定任何序列或数据点颜色，使用的颜色取决于图表类型与对象的调色板或一系列关联，如果指定了一个调色板。If no series or data point colors are explicitly specified, the colors used depend on the chart type and the object's palette or the palette of an associated series, if one is specified. > [!NOTE] > 如果`Palette`属性同时和对象设置为，和为相关的数据序列或数据点分配任何颜色，数据点将不绘制，并将显示为"空"区域。If the `Palette` property for both the and objects is set to , and no color is assigned to the relevant data series or data points, the data points will not be drawn, and will be displayed as "empty" areas.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 以下列表描述可以在用于呈现图表图像的三种方式：The following list describes the three ways in which a chart image can be rendered: - 呈现类型会导致临时文件保存到在服务器上的磁盘。The render type causes a temporary file to be saved to disk at the server. 图表显示在客户端使用\ 标记，并其 SRC 属性设置为指定的 URL属性。The chart is displayed at the client side using an \ tag, with its SRC attribute set to the URL specified by the property. - 如果呈现指定类型，在服务器上没有任何临时图像文件。If the render type is specified, there are no temporary image files at the server. 相反，图表图像作为二进制流发送和显示使用\ 标记中使用的 SRC 属性设置为负责生成图表图像的另一个.aspx 页。Instead, the chart image is sent as a binary stream, and is displayed using an \ tag with its SRC attribute set to another .aspx page that is responsible for generating the chart image. - 呈现类型导致图像映射来创建，但不会导致实际图表图像的显示。A render type of causes an image map to be created, but does not result in the display of an actual chart image. 使用图像映射具有的呈现器类型时，仅应采取此选项。This option should only be taken when using an image map that has a render type of . 请注意，你可以控制如何将临时图像文件保存到磁盘使用属性。Note that you can control how temporary image files are saved to disk using the property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果将此属性设置为`true`，将取消显示非关键异常。If you set this property to `true`, non-critical exceptions will be suppressed. 当控件无法正确绘制图表使用的数据和提供其他设置，将引发异常。When the control cannot properly plot the chart using the data and other settings provided, an exception will be thrown. 虽然显示异常在应用程序测试期间很有用，它们应时不会显示在发布应用程序。Although displaying exceptions is useful during application testing, they should not be shown when the application is released. > [!NOTE] > 此属性设置为`true`可能隐藏用户应用程序源代码中的严重问题。Setting this property to `true` may hide serious issues in the user application source code. 此设置还可能会导致图表图像生成可能会误报你的数据。This setting could also cause a chart image to be generated that might misrepresent your data. 强烈建议将此模式，仅用于的发布版本。It is highly recommended that this mode be only used in Release builds.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此属性设置的视图状态控件。Use this property to set the view state of the control. 如果设置此属性，通过情况下会自动保存的视图状态控件，然后就还会自动加载回发发生时。When you set this property, the view state is automatically saved by the control, and is also loaded automatically when a postback occurs. 对于更大的灵活性，使用用户定义的视图状态的属性。For greater flexibility, use the property for user-defined view state. 若要启用状态管理，设置属性`true`。To enable state management, set the property to `true`.

summary.span: Gets or sets the user-defined view state of the control.

span.span: Gets or sets the user-defined view state of the control.

value.span: A值，该值表示在客户端的 Web 文档中嵌入的控件的视图状态。

span.span: A value that represents the view state of the control, which is embedded in the Web document at the client.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性指定数据保留在客户端时，提供更大的灵活性与比较属性。When you specify data to persist at the client, this property provides greater flexibility compared with the property. 实现用户定义的视图状态时，它是由开发人员设置的视图状态，并且利用在回发时的视图状态。When the user-defined view state is implemented, it is up to the developer to set the view state, and to utilize the view state when a postback occurs. `Save`和`Load`方法对象 （可选） 可用来设置的视图状态，以及有关回发发生时加载视图状态。The `Save` and `Load` methods of the object can optionally be used to set the view state, as well as to load the view state when a postback occurs. 有关此示例，请参阅下面的示例代码。See the sample code below for an example of this. 为简单起见，指定要保存图表状态时，使用属性，可以将设置为数据和 / 或可视外观属性。For simplicity, when you specify the chart state to be saved, use the property, which can be set to data, visual appearance properties or both. 若要启用状态管理，设置属性`true`。To enable state management, set the property to `true`.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 没有在百分号 （%） 或点 (pt) 中指定值。Do not specify the value in percentage (%) or point (pt). 否则会引发异常。Otherwise, an exception is thrown.
